name: The Coin Collector (ArpitSG)
description:
The Coin Collector

It's a free-to-play 2-D Levels(Waves) based game. it currently has 3 Waves each with increasing difficulty. Each Wave is to be completed to finish the game.

Genre: Fantasy & Strategy, Interactive Fiction.

Control: Side View Perspective.

Custom-made User Interfaces.

Have Fun.

Try Now.
